title.narrative: Sustainable Urban Water management/Strategic Sector Cooperation project in Udaipur, India

description.narrative:
Strategic Sector Cooperation in Urban Water Management Between Denmark and India (Udaipur), Phase I
The Strategic Sector Cooperation on urban water management aims to contribute to framework conditions that improve management of the water resources In the Udaipur Municipal Cooperation and introduce integrated planning approaches by:
-Developing a model for restoration of the Ayad River front -Developing a masterplan for integrated management of the entire water cycle in Udaipur -Mapping of ground water resources and assistance in developing a plan for sustainable extraction. -Making recommendations for improved sewage water treatment with integrated energy production- - Exchange knowledge on storm water management and drinking water system

sector.narrative: Water supply and sanitation - large systems

title.narrative: Not applicable as baseline, impact indicators are not defined for current SSC projects.
